function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High international mobility of people posing a difficult-to-predict risk.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread in buildings and means of transport.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce the risk of infection in the interiors.","Technologies":"HVAC systems for ventilation and air filtration.","People":"General population, travelers, and building occupants.","Owner":"Health authorities and building management."},{"Description":"Challenge in achieving community immunity through vaccination due to rejection of vaccines and high pre-vaccination rate requirement.","Impact":"Potential failure to achieve community immunity and increased risk of infection.","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative ways to reduce the risk of infection in indoor environments.","Technologies":"HVAC systems for indoor air quality control.","People":"Population in need of vaccination and public health authorities.","Owner":"Health authorities and government."},{"Description":"Failure to modify internal conditions leading to heat stress in humans and reduced resistance to infection.","Impact":"Endangerment of human health and increased susceptibility to infection.","Mitigation":"Implementing HVAC system modifications to prevent heat stress and improve indoor air quality.","Technologies":"HVAC systems for internal condition modification.","People":"Building occupants and workers.","Owner":"Building management and employers."}]}
